commit.message:
Makefile.am (libgcj_bc_la_LIBADD): Delete.

2009-08-17  Andrew Haley  <aph@redhat.com>

        * Makefile.am (libgcj_bc_la_LIBADD): Delete.
        * libgcj.spec.in: (LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC): New spec.
        * configure.ac (LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC): New spec.

From-SVN: r150853

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
+2009-08-17  Andrew Haley  <aph@redhat.com>
+
+	* Makefile.am (libgcj_bc_la_LIBADD): Delete.
+	* libgcj.spec.in: (LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC): New spec.
+	* configure.ac (LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC): New spec.
+
 2009-08-17  Andrew Haley  <aph@redhat.com>
 
 	* Makefile.in,

@@ -358,10 +358,10 @@ lib_gnu_awt_xlib_la_LINK = $(LIBLINK)
 ## Support for libgcj_bc: dummy shared library.
 ##
 ## This lets us have one soname in BC objects and another in C++ ABI objects.
+## This library is not linked against libgcj.
 libgcj_bc_la_SOURCES = libgcj_bc.c
 libgcj_bc_la_LDFLAGS = -rpath $(toolexeclibdir) -no-static -version-info 1:0:0 \
 	$(LIBGCJ_LD_SYMBOLIC_FUNCTIONS)
-libgcj_bc_la_LIBADD = libgcj.la
 libgcj_bc_la_DEPENDENCIES = libgcj.la
 libgcj_bc_la_LINK = $(LIBLINK)
 ## This is specific to Linux/{Free,Net,Open}BSD/Hurd and perhaps few others.

@@ -450,6 +450,7 @@ am_libgcj_la_OBJECTS = prims.lo jni.lo exception.lo stacktrace.lo \
 	$(am__objects_8) $(am__objects_9) $(am__objects_10) \
 	$(am__objects_11) $(am__objects_12) $(am__objects_13)
 libgcj_la_OBJECTS = $(am_libgcj_la_OBJECTS)
+libgcj_bc_la_LIBADD =
 am_libgcj_bc_la_OBJECTS = libgcj_bc.lo
 libgcj_bc_la_OBJECTS = $(am_libgcj_bc_la_OBJECTS)
 @USE_LIBGCJ_BC_TRUE@am_libgcj_bc_la_rpath = -rpath $(toolexeclibdir)
@@ -702,6 +703,7 @@ LIBFFI = @LIBFFI@
 LIBFFIINCS = @LIBFFIINCS@
 LIBGCJDEBUG = @LIBGCJDEBUG@
 LIBGCJTESTSPEC = @LIBGCJTESTSPEC@
+LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC = @LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC@
 LIBGCJ_CFLAGS = @LIBGCJ_CFLAGS@
 LIBGCJ_CXXFLAGS = @LIBGCJ_CXXFLAGS@
 LIBGCJ_JAVAFLAGS = @LIBGCJ_JAVAFLAGS@
@@ -1074,7 +1076,6 @@ libgcj_bc_la_SOURCES = libgcj_bc.c
 libgcj_bc_la_LDFLAGS = -rpath $(toolexeclibdir) -no-static -version-info 1:0:0 \
 	$(LIBGCJ_LD_SYMBOLIC_FUNCTIONS)
 
-libgcj_bc_la_LIBADD = libgcj.la
 libgcj_bc_la_DEPENDENCIES = libgcj.la
 libgcj_bc_la_LINK = $(LIBLINK)
 libgcj_bc_dummy_LINK = $(CC) -L$(here)/.libs $(CFLAGS) $(LDFLAGS) -shared \

@@ -459,7 +459,7 @@ ac_includes_default="\
 #endif"
 
 ac_subdirs_all="$ac_subdirs_all classpath libltdl"
-ac_subst_vars='SHELL PATH_SEPARATOR PACKAGE_NAME PACKAGE_TARNAME PACKAGE_VERSION PACKAGE_STRING PACKAGE_BUGREPORT exec_prefix prefix program_transform_name bindir sbindir libexecdir datadir sysconfdir sharedstatedir localstatedir libdir includedir oldincludedir infodir mandir build_alias host_alias target_alias DEFS ECHO_C ECHO_N ECHO_T LIBS build build_cpu build_vendor build_os build_libsubdir build_subdir host_subdir target_subdir multi_basedir host host_cpu host_vendor host_os target target_cpu target_vendor target_os target_noncanonical LN_S mkinstalldirs ANTLR_JAR CYGPATH_W PACKAGE VERSION ACLOCAL AUTOCONF AUTOMAKE AUTOHEADER MAKEINFO install_sh STRIP ac_ct_STRIP INSTALL_STRIP_PROGRAM mkdir_p AWK SET_MAKE am__leading_dot AMTAR am__tar am__untar DEPDIR am__include am__quote AMDEP_TRUE AMDEP_FALSE AMDEPBACKSLASH CCDEPMODE am__fastdepCC_TRUE am__fastdepCC_FALSE CXXDEPMODE am__fastdepCXX_TRUE am__fastdepCXX_FALSE AS ac_ct_AS LD ac_ct_LD AR ac_ct_AR ac_ct_DSYMUTIL NMEDIT ac_ct_NMEDIT LIPO ac_ct_LIPO OTOOL ac_ct_OTOOL OTOOL64 ac_ct_OTOOL64 CPP CPPFLAGS CXXCPP GCJ GCJFLAGS GCJDEPMODE am__fastdepGCJ_TRUE am__fastdepGCJ_FALSE subdirs TESTSUBDIR_TRUE NATIVE_FALSE ENABLE_SHARED_TRUE ENABLE_SHARED_FALSE NEEDS_DATA_START_TRUE NEEDS_DATA_START_FALSE INSTALL_BINARIES_TRUE INSTALL_BINARIES_FALSE GCC_UNWIND_INCLUDE toolexecdir toolexecmainlibdir JRE_DIR JRE_LNK SDK_LNK SDK_BIN_DIR SDK_LIB_DIR SDK_INCLUDE_DIR JRE_BIN_DIR JRE_LIB_DIR GCJ_BIN_DIR CPU OS LIBDIR LIBOBJS LTLIBOBJS'
+ac_subst_vars='SHELL PATH_SEPARATOR PACKAGE_NAME PACKAGE_TARNAME PACKAGE_VERSION PACKAGE_STRING PACKAGE_BUGREPORT exec_prefix prefix program_transform_name bindir sbindir libexecdir datadir  ac_subst_files=''
 ac_pwd=`pwd`
 
@@ -20948,9 +20948,9 @@ if test -d sysdep; then true; else mkdir sysdep; fi
 LIBGCJ_SPEC="%{s-bc-abi:} -lgcj"
 if test "$use_libgcj_bc" = yes; then
   LIBGCJ_SPEC="%{static|static-libgcj|!s-bc-abi:-lgcj;:-lgcj_bc}"
+  LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC="%{findirect-dispatch:-fPIC}"
 fi
 
-
 HASH_SYNC_SPEC=
 # Hash synchronization is only useful with posix threads right now.
 if test "$enable_hash_synchronization" = yes && test "$THREADS" != "none"; then
@@ -29969,6 +29969,7 @@ s,@USING_NO_THREADS_FALSE@,$USING_NO_THREADS_FALSE,;t t
 s,@USE_LIBGCJ_BC_TRUE@,$USE_LIBGCJ_BC_TRUE,;t t
 s,@USE_LIBGCJ_BC_FALSE@,$USE_LIBGCJ_BC_FALSE,;t t
 s,@LIBGCJ_SPEC@,$LIBGCJ_SPEC,;t t
+s,@LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC@,$LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC,;t t
 s,@HASH_SYNC_SPEC@,$HASH_SYNC_SPEC,;t t
 s,@USING_GCC_TRUE@,$USING_GCC_TRUE,;t t
 s,@USING_GCC_FALSE@,$USING_GCC_FALSE,;t t

@@ -1078,8 +1078,10 @@ AC_CONFIG_LINKS(sysdep/descriptor.h:$descriptor_h)
 LIBGCJ_SPEC="%{s-bc-abi:} -lgcj"
 if test "$use_libgcj_bc" = yes; then
   LIBGCJ_SPEC="%{static|static-libgcj|!s-bc-abi:-lgcj;:-lgcj_bc}"
+  LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC="%{findirect-dispatch:-fPIC}"
 fi
 AC_SUBST(LIBGCJ_SPEC)
+AC_SUBST(LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC)
 
 HASH_SYNC_SPEC=
 # Hash synchronization is only useful with posix threads right now.

@@ -198,6 +198,7 @@ LIBFFI = @LIBFFI@
 LIBFFIINCS = @LIBFFIINCS@
 LIBGCJDEBUG = @LIBGCJDEBUG@
 LIBGCJTESTSPEC = @LIBGCJTESTSPEC@
+LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC = @LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC@
 LIBGCJ_CFLAGS = @LIBGCJ_CFLAGS@
 LIBGCJ_CXXFLAGS = @LIBGCJ_CXXFLAGS@
 LIBGCJ_JAVAFLAGS = @LIBGCJ_JAVAFLAGS@

@@ -197,6 +197,7 @@ LIBFFI = @LIBFFI@
 LIBFFIINCS = @LIBFFIINCS@
 LIBGCJDEBUG = @LIBGCJDEBUG@
 LIBGCJTESTSPEC = @LIBGCJTESTSPEC@
+LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC = @LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC@
 LIBGCJ_CFLAGS = @LIBGCJ_CFLAGS@
 LIBGCJ_CXXFLAGS = @LIBGCJ_CXXFLAGS@
 LIBGCJ_JAVAFLAGS = @LIBGCJ_JAVAFLAGS@

@@ -186,6 +186,7 @@ LIBFFI = @LIBFFI@

 LIBGCJDEBUG = @LIBGCJDEBUG@
 LIBGCJTESTSPEC = @LIBGCJTESTSPEC@
+LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC = @LIBGCJ_BC_SPEC@
